Posts.Content: I suffer with breast abscess and it is very painful and am going through the same thing as you I have an abscess on both breasts and am in constant pain
Posts.Title: Painful Cysts In My Breast

Posts.Content: I suffer from breast abccess and the doctor gives me antibiotics but not helping. I have seen other doctors and had surgery twice. The abscess comes back and is very painful until it breaks which is smelly what can I do to stop this? I have had them for over 2 years Could this be a form of breast cancer?
Posts.Title: Breast Abscess
